description:
Blaming and firing coaches in the NFL is not the answer

Zion is the next star to carry the NBA when LeBron retires

Bad news if your aren't a fan of Tom Brady

The 49ers do the one thing that all successful teams do in the NFL


Guests: Nick Swisher, FOX Sports MLB Analyst & World Series Champion

Chris Simms, NBC Sports
